# Comprehend Languages (Spell)
## Overview
[[Divination Spells|Divination]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Adept Spells|Adept 1]], [[1st Level Alchemist Spells|Alchemist 1]], [[1st Level Bard Spells|Bard 1]], [[1st Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 1]], [[1st Level Inquisitor Spells|Inquisitor 1]], [[1st Level Mesmerist Spells|Mesmerist 1]], [[1st Level Oracle Spells|Oracle 1]], [[1st Level Psychic Spells|Psychic 1]], [[1st Level Shaman Spells|Shaman 1]], [[1st Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 1]], [[1st Level Witch Spells|Witch 1]], [[1st Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 1]]

**Domain:** [[Knowledge (Domain)|Knowledge 1]]; **Subdomain:** Language 1

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 2nd-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 2]], [[BoXM 2nd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 2]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M/DF (pinch of soot and salt)

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 10 minutes/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 258

You can understand the spoken words of creatures or read otherwise incomprehensible written messages. The ability to read does not necessarily impart insight into the material, merely its literal meaning. The spell enables you to understand or read an unknown language, not speak or write it.

Written material can be read at the rate of one page (250 words) per minute. Magical writing cannot be read, though the spell reveals that it is magical. This spell can be foiled by certain warding magic (such as the *[[Secret Page (Spell)|secret page]]* and *[[Illusory Script (Spell)|illusory script]]* spells). It does not decipher codes or reveal messages concealed in otherwise normal text.

*Comprehend languages* can be made permanent with a *[[Permanency (Spell)|permanency]]* spell.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Added Alchemist 1 per Advanced Player's Guide
